caller_intent: The caller, Monica from Better Way Automotive, requested a copy of their recently renewed bond.
resolution_steps: Agent acknowledged the request and asked for confirmation of the business name (Better Way Automotive).
Agent attempted to transfer the caller to 'Gloria' for assistance.
knowledge_required: Understanding of bond renewal processes for automotive businesses
Ability to route calls to appropriate personnel (e.g., Gloria)
summary: Monica from Better Way Automotive requested a copy of their renewed bond. The agent confirmed the business name and attempted to transfer the call to Gloria, but the conversation ended before confirmation of the transfer's success.
